post.text: #TamilNadu |BJP wants to impose 1 language & 1 culture on entire nation. We want unity but respect diversity. We don't want uniformity. Every state, every culture & every language has a place in this beautiful country & that place should be respected: #Congress MP #RahulGandhi

comments.text: BJP doesn't want to impose one nation one culture formula. But you certainly have used divide & use for years together & are still using it. Earlier you divided country in religion & now you are trying to divide it in regions. You are trying to put south against north.
This liar Never misses a single chance to spread hate among people.

Bro if you don't learn Hindi then how would you communicate in other states ! English is not our mother tongue .we are humans not robots. We can't learn all 28 regional languages. There should be one common language to communicate. That's Hindi.#onecountry #one language
